::Havok/Repressor::

"Very bad, it seems," Havoc replies, seeing the Destron base, at least 
the mountain that it was buried under, come into view. He lands near 
Cygnar and the others, Repressor landing beside him.

"I'm Havoc," he says to the Destron group, "Zardus sent me and my men 
to help you out. Do you need any help?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He went into his room, in the CF, and found things nocked over from 
the
> battle. He tidyed up, and went to the CR's to repair. As he was 
being

the
> others. He also saw Feline. This reminded him of his personal 
mission.
> Win her back...
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He quickly transformes to beetle mode, and drills under the ground 
as
> the terror force hits. After it is clear he comes up, and changes to 
bot
> mode. He then fires optic lasers at Angel Prime.
> 
> ::Epyon::
> 
> "Ok, Starice. I'll see you later."
> He makes his way to the bridge of the StarJumper, and sits in his
> command chair. He then opens a comm.
> "Wizard, I need to speak with you on the bridge, at your 
convieniance."
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He flew towards the Destron base.
> "So Havoc, how bad is it supposed to be there?"
> 
> ::Dollen::

> He still waited outside the energy field, with no response.
